DialogueOption.Text: Why do you keep saying random things before I launch?

Dialogue.Page: Huh? Is that shade you're throwing at me? Because if that is shade I'll have you know that the fuel in those tanks does eventually run out, and I'm the one who refuels them, so you better be nice to me.
Not sure what you mean though. If by "random things" you mean "giving pilots actually good advice before their first launch", I guess I do it out of the goodness of my heart, you know?
Also, don't you have something better to do? You know, space? Go harass some other lifeform and accuse them of being random. Maybe an Anglerfish. I'm sure they'll like that.
